tagToAllowSkip.description: The characters 'na' Will be removed, allows for commit message validation to be skipped (case sensitive).

standardTags.description: The commit introduces a new feature!
Modifying code style, no real changes to code flow.
Changes the code, but it doesn't seem to change from the outside.
Added another test, or series of tests, to exercise the code.
Changes that do not fit in other categories, but are still needed to help maintain the codebase.
Use when introducing a change that will break consumers (hopefully rare!).
